creation_date.description: When the card was created. In ISO 8601 format

expiration_date.description: When the card will expire. In ISO 8601 format

template.description: Link to a Handlebars template for rendering the card

description.description: Description of the body. This would typically be rendered as plain body text near the top of the card

fields.description: The fields of the body, if any. Fields are rendered differently according to their type attribute

content.description: The content of this field, which can consist of arbitrary JSON objects. The client will use the field's type attribute to determine how to parse the content.

action_key.description: An arbitrary string used by the client to distinguish this action from other actions that may be sent

label.description: A human-readable description of the action to be shown in the card

completed_label.description: A human-readable message to display on successful completion of the action

url.description: Link to the action. Optionally prefixed with X-Routing-Prefix. See Request Headers in wiki

type.description: The HTTP method to use for submitting the action request

user_input.description: Allows the user to enter data to be submitted in this action

request.description: Hard-coded fields to be sent with the action request

remove_card_on_completion.description: Whether or not clients should remove the card upon successful completion of this action

id.description: The field's ID, which will be used as the key when this field is submitted

label.description: The field's label, which will be displayed to the user to describe the expected content of the field

format.description: The type of the user input

options.description: Options to present when format is select.

min_length.description: The minimum length of the field

max_length.description: The maximum length of the field
